languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта наносит 2 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} в конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели, затем эффект спадает.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect deals 2 direct damage at the end of the target's turn, then the effect removes.

languages.text: Each stack deals +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. All stacks are removed after {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Each stack deals +2 direct damage to the target at the end of the target's turn. All stacks are removed after damage is inflicted.

Each stack deals +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. All stacks are removed after {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is inflicted.

languages.text: Chaque cumul inflige 2 points de dégâts directs supplémentaire à la fin du tour de la cible. Tous les cumuls sont supprimés lorsque les dégâts sont infligés.
languages.original_text: Each stack deals +2 direct damage to the target at the end of the target's turn. All stacks are removed after damage is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul inflige 2 points de dégâts directs supplémentaire à la fin du tour de la cible. Tous les cumuls sont supprimés lorsque les dégâts sont infligés.

languages.text: Jeder Stapel fügt dem Ziel +2 Direktschaden zu, wenn der Zug des Ziels endet. Nachdem Schaden zugefügt wurde, werden alle Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text: Each stack deals +2 direct damage to the target at the end of the target's turn. All stacks are removed after damage is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Stapel fügt dem Ziel +2 Direktschaden zu, wenn der Zug des Ziels endet. Nachdem Schaden zugefügt wurde, werden alle Stapel entfernt.

languages.text: 1スタックにつき、ターゲットのターン終了時に+2の直接ダメージを与える。ダメージを与えた後、全スタックが取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: Each stack deals +2 direct damage to the target at the end of the target's turn. All stacks are removed after damage is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: 1スタックにつき、ターゲットのターン終了時に+2の直接ダメージを与える。ダメージを与えた後、全スタックが取り除かれる。

languages.text: 目标回合结束时，每有1层“复仇反射”效果，就会承受2点直击伤害。此效果造成伤害之后，所有层数都会被移除。
languages.original_text: Each stack deals +2 direct damage to the target at the end of the target's turn. All stacks are removed after damage is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: 目标回合结束时，每有1层“复仇反射”效果，就会承受2点直击伤害。此效果造成伤害之后，所有层数都会被移除。

languages.text: Cada acumulación inflige +2 de daño directo al objetivo al final del turno del objetivo. Todas las acumulaciones se eliminan tras infligir daño.
languages.original_text: Each stack deals +2 direct damage to the target at the end of the target's turn. All stacks are removed after damage is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación inflige +2 de daño directo al objetivo al final del turno del objetivo. Todas las acumulaciones se eliminan tras infligir daño.
